an animal rescue organization in brazil
uses fish skin to treat burns on
animals injured by the effects of
urbanization vida liv institute in rio de  General has
treated a
power line rash. Among
the newly treated patients is a
donkey named buba. Doctors bandaged
his burned leg with
thoroughly dehydrated and sterilized tilapia skin.
This type of Collagen oil fish skin acts
as a layer covering the burned area,
increasing the healing process and
skin development. With this method, the animal will be
less painful and more comfortable and move
easily.  This method was
developed by researchers at the federal university
and first used on humans
in 2016 before being applied to
wild animals after the
forest fire in the Pantana area in
2020 Rio  There are two of the

annual Elephant Hat Festival has

in Nepal, especially

for elephants such as soccer polo and
racing. The highlight of the event continues

elephants decorated with many
eye-catching drawings.  Judges will score the middle
on many different criteria. We
have nine criteria to announce the winning elephant. The
most important when
evaluating is the elephant's body structure,
followed by decorative elements.
Walking and general cleanliness, elephants need
about 150 to 250 kilograms of food per day
and taking care of and training them
takes a lot of effort. We usually
wake up early in the morning after giving the elephant a
quick bath.  set out into the forest
to find food until 8:00 a.m. the next day when
we arrived home.
Nepal currently has about 100 elephants in
captivity, including elephants
used by the Government to patrol the forest.

accidents causing injuries due to homemade firecrackers
still happen, especially to teenagers
learning to make firecrackers online. Recently,
Ba Ria hospital received a patient.  A 12-
year-old male in Dat Do district was hospitalized due to
fragments of a homemade firecracker stuck in his
body. According to his family, while following
instructional videos online, the firecracker
exploded. The victim was hit by 18 pieces of glass
stuck in his body.  There were many
fragments embedded deep into the neck, even close to the trachea. It
took the doctors 4 hours to remove
all the fragments from the patient's body.
If the neck area entered the trachea or an
artery, the risk of self-destruction would be very high.
After 3 days of treatment, the patient's health
has stabilized, the wounds have
dried up,
I don't dare play anymore, I'm afraid. Every
year Ba Ria Hospital records a few
accidents caused by firecrackers, mainly  For
children, doctors recommend that Phu Huy province need to
further strengthen the work of educating children
about the dangers caused by firecrackers
to limit tragic accidents,

yacht racing.  is one of the

champion of the 78th year race
emerged after the final leg from Sydney to
Australia. The supermax boat of the Law
Connect team won first place faster. Just
51 seconds ago  The opponent was the Andrew com team.
Severe weather made it difficult for the La
Connect team on the first night of December 26,
destroying one of the sails and forcing
some small boats in the team to temporarily
stop due to equipment damage. But then la
Connect overcame the temptation to finish the
race in 19:3 58 seconds, far surpassing the
record set in 2017 and yet
they were still very
proud. The dream came true. I
never thought we would.  Achieving
this result in 15 minutes,
we were nearly five kilometers behind our opponents
in a four-team race consisting of 113
boats that had to travel
1,170 kilometers to reach Hobart, the capital of
Tasmania. Updated information later.  Half-day

chased. Cuong used a knife to stab

Lung laceration, respiratory failure, cardiovascular collapse, causing

jury found that the defendants were
completely proactive in committing two
acts of murder and robbery at the same time. They should be
